original_title: It Must Be Love, 'Cause I Feel So Dumb
overview: A lonely thirteen-year-old boy in New York City has a crush on a pretty cheerleader and ignores the quiet young girl who likes him.
tagline: Have you ever been someone who's in love  with someone who's in love with someone else? Eric is. And this is his story.
title: It Must Be Love, 'Cause I Feel So Dumb
